jobDescription: HireArt is looking to hire a Data Analyst to work on-site at our clients Austin office on a contract basis. In this role, youll support HR and Recruiting teams in data tracking and management, and help identify ways to improve data processes. An ideal candidate brings data experience as well as strong problem-solving and customer service skills. Responsibilities:Assist Recruiting & HR with inquiries for job requisitions or offers.Utilize headcount management tool to approve transfers, move positions, and unblock transactions.Maintain and audit data integrity of headcount positions (cost center, manager, talent profile, location, team assignments, etc.) within Workday and Salesforce.Reconcile headcount discrepancies and help work through hierarchy restructuring.Track budget changes.Answer database questions and reconcile systems of record.Manage e-mail alias inquiries from internal stakeholders.Determine best possible ways to streamline current processes, and identify solutions to either speed up or automate manual processes.Requirements:Bachelors degree3+ years relevant experience workin with data setsAble to gather data from multiple sources and compile it into a user-friendly format, ensuring it meets customer needsExperience fielding and responding to requestsExperience investigating incorrect data patterns as well as addressing root causeProficient in ExcelAble to run basic SQL queries and build Tableau dashboardsExperience in Workday and Salesforce a plusCommitment: This is a full-time, 6-month contract position based in Austin, TX.Apply Now!
